name: Snakes When They Meet
description:
This working, but incomplete, game was written as a proof of concept for the July 2017 Fantasy Console Jam. The Jam theme was "Union", and the aim of the game is to unite the two snakes in the blue goal area. Apart from on level 4 where you just have to reach it.

I've only developed four levels, due to lack of time, but more could easily be added if I wanted to.
